markdownDescription: The edgeGram tokenizer tokenizes input from the left side, or "edge", of a text input into n-grams of given sizes. You can't use a custom analyzer with edgeGram tokenizer in the analyzer field for [synonym](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/atlas/atlas-search/synonyms/#std-label-synonyms-ref) or [autocomplete field mapping definitions](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/atlas/atlas-search/define-field-mappings/#std-label-fts-field-mappings).

minGram.markdownDescription: Number of characters to include in the shortest token created.

maxGram.markdownDescription: Number of characters to include in the longest token created.
